description:
<p>This is principally a fee earning delivery role. The post-holder will provide specialist information governance consultancy expertise and insight to programmes and projects to achieve beneficial changes in line with the strategic goals of SCW and its customers and contributing to the development and provision of strategic IG support to customers.</p>
<p>This role will contribute to thought leadership on information governance requirements wherever the need exists across the SCW portfolio. This is will be in the context of emerging Integrated Care Systems (ICSs) and to include projects concerned with interoperability, large scale analytics, and citizen facing digital solutions. The Information Governance Consultant will be responsible for work that is highly complex in nature and will have involvement from a range of organisations/services/stakeholders at a regional and possible national level.</p>

hiringOrganization.name: South, Central and West Commissioning Support Unit

title: Information Governance Consultant
